Text: 113.55 MiB ziiisus cryin out loud... what a quality
Well, surely much better than you think.

It's encoded in H.264 - one of the newer, higher compression codecs used to put High Definition content on BlueRay and HD-DVD disks.

Try it, you might like it.   Oh and the smaller size, means you get to view the Battlestar goodness all that much sooner, than something twice the size!
